I recommand this place even though i am liittle ceasers girl.

text: Not near as good as R&R Pizza in Marana, AZ.  Pizza Hut used little slivers of green peppers. Not near as pretty as R&R.  Pizza tasted ok. Probably better right away. No dine in any more. Had to drive 40 min home before eating.  Shame they took dining room out.  R& R has eat in seating. I'll stick to going there.
